game.name: Kitchen Sabotage
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 레스토랑에서 요리하면서 4~12명의 플레이어와 온라인 또는 로컬 Wi-Fi를 통해 플레이하세요. 하지만 조심하세요! 요리사들 중 한 명 이상은 모든 음식을 망치려는 임포스터일 수 있습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play with 4-12 players online or over local WiFi while cooking in a restaurant, but be careful as one or more random players among the chefs are Imposters determined to sabotage everyone's meal!
